verses.verse: The Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad, <S%H6166><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the South, <S%H5045><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> tell that Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of Atharim; <S%H871><s%> and he fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and took <S%H7617><s%> some of them captive. <S%H7628><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "If you will indeed <S%H5414><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> into my hand, <S%H3027><s%> then I will utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> their cities. <S%H5892><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and delivered up <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites; <S%H3669><s%> and they utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them and their cities: <S%H5892><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> to compass <S%H5437><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom: <S%H123><s%> and the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> was much discouraged <S%H7114><s%> because of the way. <S%H1870><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> against God, <S%H430><s%> and against Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Why have you brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness? <S%H4057><s%> For there is no bread, <S%H3899><s%> and there is no water; <S%H4325><s%> and our soul <S%H5315><s%> loathes <S%H6973><s%> this light <S%H7052><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H5175><s%> among the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they bit <S%H5391><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "We have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> because we have spoken <S%H559><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and against you. <S%H6419><s%> Pray to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that he take away <S%H5493><s%> the serpents <S%H5175><s%> from us. <S%H4872><s%>" Moses prayed <S%H6419><s%> for the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Make <S%H6213><s%> a fiery serpent, <S%H8314><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> it on a standard: <S%H5251><s%> and it shall happen, <S%H5391><s%> that everyone who is bitten, when he sees it, <S%H7200><s%> shall live."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> a serpent <S%H5175><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> it on the standard: <S%H5251><s%> and it happened, <S%H5175><s%> that if a serpent had bitten <S%H5391><s%> any man, <S%H376><s%> when he looked <S%H5027><s%> to the serpent <S%H5175><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> he lived. <S%H2425><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled, <S%H5265><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Oboth. <S%H88><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth, <S%H88><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Iyeabarim, <S%H5863><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Moab, <S%H4124><s%> toward the sunrise.
From there they traveled, <S%H5265><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Zered. <S%H2218><s%>

From there they traveled, <S%H5265><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> which is in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that comes out <S%H3318><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites: <S%H567><s%> for the Arnon <S%H769><s%> is the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> between Moab <S%H4124><s%> and the Amorites. <S%H567><s%>

Therefore it is said <S%H559><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the Wars <S%H4421><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Vaheb <S%H2052><s%> in Suphah, <S%H5492><s%> the valleys <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%>

the slope <S%H793><s%> of the valleys <S%H5158><s%> that incline <S%H5186><s%> toward the dwelling <S%H3427><s%> of Ar, <S%H6144><s%> leans <S%H8172><s%> on the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>"

From there they traveled to Beer: <S%H876><s%> that is the well <S%H875><s%> of which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Gather <S%H622><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together, <S%H622><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them water. <S%H4325><s%>"
Then sang <S%H7891><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> this song: <S%H7892><s%> "Spring up, <S%H5927><s%> well; <S%H875><s%> sing to it: <S%H6030><s%>

the well, <S%H875><s%> which the princes <S%H8269><s%> dug, <S%H2658><s%> which the nobles <S%H5081><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> dug, <S%H3738><s%> with the scepter, <S%H2710><s%> and with their poles. <S%H4938><s%>" From the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> they traveled to Mattanah; <S%H4980><s%>
and from Mattanah <S%H4980><s%> to Nahaliel; <S%H5160><s%> and from Nahaliel <S%H5160><s%> to Bamoth; <S%H1120><s%>

and from Bamoth <S%H1120><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> which looks <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H6440><s%> on the desert. <S%H3452><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land: <S%H776><s%> we will not turn <S%H5186><s%> aside into field, <S%H7704><s%> or into vineyard; <S%H3754><s%> we will not drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the wells: <S%H875><s%> we will go <S%H3212><s%> by the king <S%H4428><s%>'s highway, <S%H1870><s%> until we have passed <S%H5674><s%> your border. <S%H1366><s%>"

Sihon <S%H5511><s%> would not allow <S%H5414><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his border: <S%H1366><s%> but Sihon <S%H5511><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all his people <S%H5971><s%> together, <S%H622><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Jahaz; <S%H3096><s%> and he fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> him with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> his land <S%H776><s%> from the Arnon <S%H769><s%> to the Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> even to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%> for the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> was strong. <S%H5794><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all these cities: <S%H5892><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and in all its towns. <S%H1323><s%>

For Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> was the city <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who had fought <S%H3898><s%> against the former <S%H7223><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and taken <S%H3947><s%> all his land <S%H776><s%> out of his hand, <S%H3027><s%> even to the Arnon. <S%H769><s%>

Therefore those who speak in proverbs <S%H4911><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Come <S%H935><s%> to Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%> Let the city <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> be built <S%H1129><s%> and established; <S%H3559><s%>

for a fire <S%H784><s%> has gone out <S%H3318><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> a flame <S%H3852><s%> from the city <S%H7151><s%> of Sihon. <S%H5511><s%> It has devoured <S%H398><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> The lords of the high places <S%H1181><s%> of the Arnon. <S%H769><s%>

Woe <S%H188><s%> to you, <S%H4124><s%> Moab! You are undone, <S%H6><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of Chemosh! <S%H3645><s%> He has given <S%H5414><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> as fugitives, <S%H6412><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> into captivity, <S%H7622><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites. <S%H567><s%>

We have shot <S%H3384><s%> at them. <S%H2809><s%> Heshbon has perished <S%H6><s%> even to Dibon. <S%H1769><s%> We have laid waste <S%H8074><s%> even to Nophah, <S%H5302><s%> Which reaches to Medeba. <S%H4311><s%>"
Thus Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites. <S%H567><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> Jazer; <S%H3270><s%> and they took <S%H3920><s%> its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and drove out <S%H3423><s%> the Amorites who were there. <S%H567><s%>

They turned <S%H6437><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of Bashan: <S%H1316><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> them, <S%H5971><s%> he and all his people, to battle <S%H4421><s%> at Edrei. <S%H154><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Don't <S%H3372><s%> fear him: <S%H5414><s%> for I have delivered him into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and all his people, <S%H5971><s%> and his land; <S%H776><s%> and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to him as you did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%>"

So they struck <S%H5221><s%> him, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons and all his people, <S%H5971><s%> until there was none <S%H1115><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> him remaining: <S%H8300><s%> and they possessed <S%H3423><s%> his land. <S%H776><s%>
